game.name: 6-7 Nights At Vicente's
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Steam Workshop, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Commentary available
game.shortDescription: 6-7 Nights at Vicente’s is a horror and strategy game in the style of Five Nights at Freddy’s. On Morcilla Island, Detective Rubevids investigates Vicente’s house, where he must keep watch, manage resources, and survive threats to uncover the truth before it’s too late.
game.shortDescriptionEn: 6-7 Nights at Vicente’s is a horror and strategy game in the style of Five Nights at Freddy’s. On Morcilla Island, Detective Rubevids investigates Vicente’s house, where he must keep watch, manage resources, and survive threats to uncover the truth before it’s too late.
